56059.name: {*T{braining {*F{bloor{x
description: {* The upper floor of the guildhall is bare, a large and empty room.
Solid wood, the walls and floor are unmarked, though they show signs
of recently having been cleaned.  Lights hang from the ceiling
overhead, and a door can be seen in one corner of the room.  {x

56046.name: {*S{bhady {*D{bealings{x
description: {*A flickering light overhead casts shadows around the corner of the
room, sending them scattering and flickering around a long counter.
Standing a few feet from the wall, it cuts diagonally across the
corner, one end hinged so it can swing up to let people in and out.
Two cabinets are on the wall behind it, locked shut, and there is a
tall stool tucked into the corner.  {x

56042.name: {*T{bhe {*M{bain {*G{buildhall{x
description: {* This floor of the guild hall is, mostly, a vast and open room made
up of once-separate rooms and buildings.  A window on the wall here is
covered fastidiously with black fabric, blotting out any light that
might filter through - as well as any prying eyes.  The air is filled
with voices, some loud and distant, others more near and hushed.  A
door is on one wall, closed tightly.  {x

56049.name: {*T{bhe {*M{bain {*G{buildhall{x
description: {* The small, milling crowd here is bustling with activity, hushed
conversations and casual discussions filling the room.  Lit by
overhead lights, the large room is visible from end to end, and
directly across from here a door opens into the bar.  Opposite the bar
door, a doorway leads into a small side room.  {x

56048.name: {*T{bhe {*M{bain {*G{buildhall{x
description: {* Compared to the narrow entrance hallway behind the door, this room
is spacious and huge.  Though there is much activity here, it is
possible to see from one end of the room to the other, and most if not
all of the people in it.  Overhead, lights dangle from the ceiling,
dimly lighting the room and casting shadows in every direction.  The
air is filled with hushed voices, though not far away there is a more
raucous and noisy crowd gathered, their shouts echoing through the
open space.  {x

56054.name: {*T{bhe {*B{bar{x
description: {* Solely referred to as The Bar, this section of the guild is a
popular spot for guild members to have a drink.  There is always noise
here, be it the hushed whisper of dark conversations or the raised
voices cheering on the latest fights in a bar brawl.  The room is
poorly lit, providing amble shadow for men and woman to stand in,
milking a drink or listening to the conversations around them.  Plenty
of seedy characters can always be found here, and there is never a
lack of information - for a price.  {x

56044.name: {*T{bhe {*M{bain {*G{buildhall{x
description: {* Dimly lit, this large room is filled with muted activity and
interesting figures.  There is no natural light here, the only
illumination given off from lights that hand from above.  They wave
slightly as people pass underneath.  In two directions, there are
counters tucked into the far corners, and in a third a door opens in
the wall to reveal a bar.  {x

56040.name: {*A N{barrow {*H{ballway{x
description: {*Hidden behind the wall of a small house, a narrow passage links it
to a larger terrace of homes.  In there near-pitch darkness, little
detail of the hallway can be seen.  The walls are featureless, the
floor even and smooth.  There is a thin sheen of dirt on the floor,
and the air smells of dust and grime.  The only light source comes
from the cracks beneath the door to the north, the muffled sound of
voices coming from beyond it.  {x

56061.name: {*T{braining {*F{bloor{x
description: {* The upper floor of the guildhall is bare, a large and empty room.
Solid wood, the walls and floor are unmarked, though they show signs
of recently having been cleaned.  Lights hang from the ceiling
overhead, and a door can be seen in one corner of the room.  {x

56050.name: {*P{bostings {*R{boom{x
description: {* Though not very deep, the room is wide, more like a hallway turned
on its side than a room of its own.  The longest wall is covered with
a cork board and pins, as well as a scattering of papers tacked onto
the board detailing various work opportunities.  Caravans hiring
guards, merchants seeking hired mercenaries, and even notices of
nobility seeking assassins can be found posted here.  A faint mark
stains the floor, long faded but holding a slight blood-colored tint.{x
{x
|    -=NEEDED :: A Brave Soul=-    |
|   I want Geoff Miranon.  Dead.   |
|Bring me his head, and you will be|
|          well rewarded.          |
|                         -Derek   |
{x
|    -=NEEDED :: A Brave Soul=-    |
|   I want Geoff Miranon.  Dead.   |
|Bring me his head, and you will be|
|          well rewarded.          |
|                         -Derek   |
{x
|    -=NEEDED :: A Brave Soul=-    |
|   I want Geoff Miranon.  Dead.   |
|Bring me his head, and you will be|
|          well rewarded.          |
|                         -Derek   |

56056.name: {*G{buildhall {*R{boof{x
description: {* Sloping underfoot is the roof of the Thieves Guild.  There is no
railing and no ledge, but the slope is not so steep that it is
unmanagable.  Looking out, the entire southern section of Baldur's
Gate can be seen on a clear day, the Temple of Umberlee, the Harbour
Master's Building, even a glimpe of the sea beyond.  Over the side of
the roof is a steep drop onto Shadow's Alley.  {x

56066.name: {*T{braining {*F{bloor{x
description: {* The upper floor of the guildhall is bare, a large and empty room.
Solid wood, the walls and floor are unmarked, though they show signs
of recently having been cleaned.  Lights hang from the ceiling
overhead, and a door can be seen in one corner of the room.  {x

56041.name: {*T{bhe {*B{bar{x
description: {* Solely referred to as The Bar, this section of the guild is a
popular spot for guild members to have a drink.  There is always noise
here, be it the hushed whisper of dark conversations or the raised
voices cheering on the latest fights in a bar brawl.  The room is
poorly lit, providing amble shadow for men and woman to stand in,
milking a drink or listening to the conversations around them.  Plenty
of seedy characters can always be found here, and there is never a
lack of information - for a price.  {x

56064.name: {*G{buildmaster's {*O{bffice{x
description: {* Large and comfortably spacious, the office of the Thieves' Guild
Guildmaster has plenty of room to move about in.  The walls are lined
with shelves, cabinets, and an assortment of mounted weapons.  Though
there are no windows, the light in the room is brighter than elsewhere
in the guildhall, provided by numerous overhead hanging lights.  {x

56057.name: {*T{braining {*F{bloor{x
description: {* The upper floor of the guildhall is bare, a large and empty room.
Solid wood, the walls and floor are unmarked, though they show signs
of recently having been cleaned.  Lights hang from the ceiling
overhead, and a door can be seen in one corner of the room.  {x

56045.name: {*T{bhe {*M{bain {*G{buildhall{x
description: {* The shadows here sway back and forth with the light that hangs
overhead.  Low key activity fills this large space, though it is
possible to see every corner of the room.  On the walls, there are
marks of where removed walls used to be, and there is patching here
that suggests there was once a door.  Not far away, a counter sits
against the wall, cabinets hanging on the wall behind it.  {x

56063.name: {*T{braining {*F{bloor{x
description: {* The upper floor of the guildhall is bare, a large and empty room.
Solid wood, the walls and floor are unmarked, though they show signs
of recently having been cleaned.  Lights hang from the ceiling
overhead, and a door can be seen in one corner of the room.  {x

56060.name: {*T{braining {*F{bloor{x
description: {* The upper floor of the guildhall is bare, a large and empty room.
Solid wood, the walls and floor are unmarked, though they show signs
of recently having been cleaned.  Lights hang from the ceiling
overhead, and a door can be seen in one corner of the room.  {x

56055.name: {*T{braining {*F{bloor{x

Solid wood, the walls and floor are unmarked, though they show signs
of recently having been cleaned.  Lights hang from the ceiling
overhead, and a door can be seen in one corner of the room.  {x

56047.name: {*T{bhe {*M{bain {*G{buildhall{x

covered fastidiously with black fabric, blotting out any light that
might filter through - as well as any prying eyes.  The air is filled
with voices, some loud and distant, others more near and hushed.  A
door is on one wall, closed tightly.  {x

56067.name: {*T{braining {*F{bloor{x

Solid wood, the walls and floor are unmarked, though they show signs
of recently having been cleaned.  Lights hang from the ceiling
overhead, and a door can be seen in one corner of the room.  {x

56053.name: {*T{bhe {*B{bar{x
description: {* Solely referred to as The Bar, this section of the guild is a
popular spot for guild members to have a drink.  There is always noise
here, be it the hushed whisper of dark conversations or the raised
voices cheering on the latest fights in a bar brawl.  The room is
poorly lit, providing amble shadow for men and woman to stand in,
milking a drink or listening to the conversations around them.  Plenty
of seedy characters can always be found here, and there is never a
lack of information - for a price.  {x
{x
The thin outline of a door can be seen on the western wall.

56062.name: {*T{braining {*F{bloor{x
description: {* The upper floor of the guildhall is bare, a large and empty room.
Solid wood, the walls and floor are unmarked, though they show signs
of recently having been cleaned.  Lights hang from the ceiling
overhead, and a door can be seen in one corner of the room.  {x

56051.name: {*A N{barrow {*H{ballway{x
description: {*Hidden behind the wall of a small house, a narrow passage links it
to a larger terrace of homes.  In there near-pitch darkness, little
detail of the hallway can be seen.  The walls are featureless, the
floor even and smooth.  There is a thin sheen of dirt on the floor,
and the air smells of dust and grime.  The only light source comes
from the cracks beneath the door to the north, the muffled sound of
voices coming from beyond it.  {x

56068.name: {*G{buildhall {*R{boof{x
description: {* The roof comes to an end, leaving a sudden drop onto Balduran Way
below.  Underfoot, the slope is shallow, with a scattering of loose
shingles, rocks, and other debree challenging those who walk here.  In
the distance, the sea rolls in waves and the southern portion of the
city is laid out for all to see; it is a sight that would be envied by
most citizens were it commonly known.  {x

56058.name: {*T{braining {*F{bloor{x
description: {* The upper floor of the guildhall is bare, a large and empty room.
Solid wood, the walls and floor are unmarked, though they show signs
of recently having been cleaned.  Lights hang from the ceiling
overhead, and a door can be seen in one corner of the room.  {x

56065.name: {*T{braining {*F{bloor{x
description: {* The upper floor of the guildhall is bare, a large and empty room.
Solid wood, the walls and floor are unmarked, though they show signs
of recently having been cleaned.  Lights hang from the ceiling
overhead, and a door can be seen in one corner of the room.  {x

56052.name: {*A N{barrow {*H{ballway{x
description: {*Hidden behind the wall of a small house, a narrow passage links it
to a larger terrace of homes.  In there near-pitch darkness, little
detail of the hallway can be seen.  The walls are featureless, the
floor even and smooth.  There is a thin sheen of dirt on the floor,
and the air smells of dust and grime.  The only light source comes
from the cracks beneath the door to the north, the muffled sound of
voices coming from beyond it.  {x

56043.name: {*F{bencing {*P{bost{x
description: {*Tucked into the corner of the guild is a small counter.  Drinks and
food cover the top of it as it runs along the wall, turning with the
corner and tapering into the wall on both ends.  A pile of blank
parchments is tucked into the back corner, as well as a variety of
writing instruments.  A light hangs from the ceiling over the counter.{x

56040.name: Derek~
description:
Greasy hair pulled back into a pony tail, it hangs in long, limp
strings.  His face is pot-marked with scars of long-lost acne, and his
grin is filled with chipped or missing teeth.  Barely a stick of a
man, his is skin and bones, wearing a ratty shirt that is three sizes
too big.  Everyone who walks into the room he eyes critically, the
same leering grin on his face.
56040.room_name: A lanky man leans against the far wall casually.

56041.name: a fencer~
description:
With a heart-shaped face and big blue eyes, few would believe the
cunning smile on her face.  Her blond hair, cut at the shoulders, is
tucked behind her ears to show the small gold stud she wears in one
ear.  Simple but feminine, her clothes genuinely accent her delicate
figure.  Intelligence glimmers in her eyes.
56041.room_name: A young woman sits on the counter, wanting to fence your goods.

56042.name: a caped man~
description:
Wearing all black, he hunches forward as he perches on the stool
and watches everyone with a sharp eye.  His cunning grin reveals a
single, golden tooth that glints as it catches the light from above. 
Slender and well built, his clothes are tight, cuffs clinging to his
wrists.  The one exception to this is the billowing cape that falls
behind him, clasped around his neck with a silver chain.
56042.room_name: Perched on the stool is a man in a cape.

56043.name: the bartender~
description:
A hulk of a man, he is built large and grown larger.  Muscular and
imposing, he is both tall and mean looking, able to intimidate any of
the folks in the bar with ease.  Fine stubble shades his face, and a
head a short black hair frames his round, bulky head.  In breeches and
a plain tunic, his arms are bare and reveal a variety of tattoos
etched into his skin.
56043.room_name: Behind the bar is a large, grizzled man.

56044.name: Geoff~
description:
He wears a white wife-beater that is spotless, and a pair of loose,
brown breeches.  Leather boots cover his feet, tucked under his pants
legs, and he wears a pair of fingerless gloves.  His blonde hair is
long, pulled back and tied behind his neck; it falls casually behind
him, clean and well kept.  With a strong build, he is muscular and
tan, but he wears a friendly smile on his face.  Around his neck hangs
a small crest, marking him a member of the clan Miranon.
subroutines:
F par A
M KILL 56041 100~
M DEATH 56042 100~
56044.room_name: Sitting on the roof is a friendly-looking fellow.

56045.name: a thief~
description:
There is little of note of this thief.  He is small in build and
fleet of foot, with tight fitting clothes that give little to be
grasped at.  A bandanna is wrapped around his head, keeping his short,
dark hair out of his eyes as he practices.
56045.room_name: A thief is here, going through fighting drills.

56046.name: the guildmaster~
description:
He stands with great bearing, exuding a confident aura.  Everything
about him speaks of power and stature, and there is little warmth in
his brown eyes.  Wearing unassuming clothing, he could fit in with the
crowd if not for his bearing and the black and gold armlet wrapped
around his upper left arm.
56046.d_flags: D {cimpales himself on his own dagger, refusing defeat.{x~
56046.room_name: The guildmaster wanders the guild, watching its members carefully.

56047.name: {wA S{*hady {wM{*an{x~
description:
A tall, gaunt halfelf dress in dark clothes, loosely fitting, but
not so loose as to get in the way of a fight.
56047.room_name: A {wM{*an{x hiding away in the {wS{*hadows{x stares at you intently, never taking his eyes off you.

56048.name: a mercenary~
description:
Slender and muscular, she dresses as a man in breeches and a tunic.
Her blonde hair is short and spiky, her eyes a glimmering green.  Cut
short, her hair reveals slightly pointed ears that hint of fey
heritage somewhere in her past.
56048.d_flags: D {clunges toward her killer, attempting to return the favor.{x~
56048.room_name: A halfelf woman stands here, her eyes keen.

56049.name: an assassin~
description:
It is a strange sight to see such a noble man within the walls of a
thieves' guild.  His black hair is raven-dark and perfectedly shaped,
looking sleek.  He keeps a trim goatee, and wears a fine shirt and
pants that set him apart from most others in the guildhall.  A sword
hangs at his hip, and the only sign to his ulterior life is a thin,
fading scar across his cheek.
56049.d_flags: D {ccollapses quite suddenly, a look of shock on his face.{x~
56049.room_name: Standing here is a man of seemingly noble bearing.

56050.name: a rogue~
description:
His 5 o'clock shadow and twinkling blue eyes give him a jolly,
rugged look.  Dark brown hair, cropped short, rests atop his head in a
tousled mop that would be more fitting on a ten year old boy than on a
grown man.  Though his breeches are plain, he wears an extravagent
emerald shirt that is a splash of color in the dark guildhall.
subroutines:
M GIVE 56046 12024~
M SPEECH 56045 gem of power~
M BRIBE 56047 10000~
56050.room_name: A man is here wearing a mischievous grin.

56051.name: a pickpocket~
description:
She is an unassuming little girl, wearing a tattering dress.  Her
long, dirty blonde hair is up in pigtails, tied with pink ribbons that
are stained and streaked with dirt.  Sweet and angelic, she has a
heart-shaped face that betrays her quick fingers.
56051.room_name: A young girl crouches here, looking out of place.

56052.name: a young thief~
description:
Small and skinny, he appears as a boy off the streets, making his
way through life well as he can.  His clothes are mere rags, a torn
pair of shorts and a stained shirt, and his bare feet are scratched
and calloused.  Tufts of red hair stick out from under the floppy
brown cap he wears on his head; a size too big, it falls over his
eyebrows and sits on his ears.
56052.d_flags: D {cflips the bird and swears beligerantly.{x~
56052.room_name: A boy stands here wearing a cunning smile.

56053.name: a halfling thief~
description:
This little halfling looks around as if he's watching for someone,
or some opportunity to present itself.  He may well still be in
training, but he hides like an expert, only shifting his eyes
momentarily to learn the room and all who stand within.  There is
little about him that you would trust.
56053.room_name: A young halfling stands in the shadows, watching.
